column1: Shisui is located on the Shimōsa Plateau in northern Chiba Prefecture. The town overlooks the Inba Marsh. The town sits on relatively flat
column2: even ground. The south of Shisui is crossed by three small rivers: the Takazaki

column1: Shisui was historically a center of rice and sake production. The town is located directly south of Narita International Airport. The central part of the town was developed as a regional commercial center beginning in 1975 due to the construction and expansion of the airport.
